page.title: 18ATTITUDES.
page.content: PREJUDICES. This attitude is a bad thing for the individual and the community as a whole.During WORLD WAR 11 the GERMANS killed many JEWS through ignorance and hate.During the AMERICAN CIVIL WAR hatred of the black/skinned race caused brother to fight brother and divisions of entire families .It also resulted in the killing of a President of the UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. Man has continued to diversify with man throughout history. 1985 is 40 years since AMERICA dropped the first ATOMIC bomb on JAPAN which brought the 1943 war to a speedy conclusion .In our community here we strive to help each other and to live together with all peoples regardless of creed, race or colour.God created us to live in a world of PEACE.By TONY BUCHANAN 1985.
